announcements.title: Introducing Emitly: A New Era of Effortless Chatting
announcements.content:
We’re excited to give you an early look at **Emitly**, our upcoming browser-based chat platform built for simplicity, speed, and elegance. Emitly is designed to make conversations seamless — without the need for downloads, installations, or complex setup.

## A Platform That Just Works

Emitly runs entirely in your browser. It’s fast, responsive, and accessible from any modern device — desktop, tablet, or mobile. There’s no app to install and no friction between you and the people you want to talk to.

## Simple Yet Powerful Features

Emitly will support real-time chat, friend management, and contact lists from day one. The interface is minimal yet full-featured, making it easy to connect, communicate, and stay in touch — all in one place.

## Built for the Modern Web

Emitly is being developed as a **Progressive Web App (PWA)**. That means it can be installed to your home screen, works offline, and behaves like a native app — all without leaving your browser.

## Designed with Care

From its clean design to its smooth interactions, every part of Emitly is thoughtfully crafted. The goal is to provide a focused, distraction-free chatting experience without unnecessary complexity.

## What to Expect Next

Emitly is currently in the final stages of development. Here’s what’s coming:

- Direct messaging with fast delivery
- Friends and contact management
- Clean, responsive UI with light/dark mode
- Browser-first experience — no app needed

In the future, we’ll be expanding with features like group chats, message reactions, media sharing, and more — all while keeping the experience light and enjoyable.

---

**Emitly is coming soon.** Stay tuned for the launch and get ready to experience chat, reimagined for the modern web.
announcements.author: Arctyll Team

announcements.title: Sneak Peek: VeyzenClient Is Coming
announcements.content:
**VeyzenClient** is our new open-source Minecraft 1.8.9 Forge-based client — built from scratch with performance, modularity, and user experience in mind.

## Still in Development

VeyzenClient is currently **in early development** (started mid-2025), and there is **no public release yet**. We're working hard to ensure the first version is stable, customizable, and blazing fast.

## What's Planned?

Here’s a quick glance at what’s coming:

- Modular settings system
- Optimized Forge base for Minecraft 1.8.9
- Smooth UI built for PvP and customization
- Feature-rich mod loader and cleaner file structure

## Get Involved

You can already explore the source code, star the repo, or track progress on our GitHub.

Stay tuned for updates — and follow along as we build something truly fresh for the 1.8.9 PvP scene.

---

**Visit the [VeyzenClient GitHub](https://github.com/Arctyll/VeyzenClient) to preview what’s coming.**
